remarks: A function on an open interval, with bounded derivative, is bounded. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dvbdfbdioo.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
dvbdfbdioo.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
dvbdfbdioo.altb $e |- ( ph -> A < B ) $.
dvbdfbdioo.f $e |- ( ph -> F : ( A (,) B ) --> RR ) $.
dvbdfbdioo.dmdv $e |- ( ph -> dom ( RR _D F ) = ( A (,) B ) ) $.
dvbdfbdioo.dvbd $e |- ( ph -> E. a e. RR A. x e. ( A (,) B ) ( abs ` ( ( RR _D F ) ` x ) ) <_ a ) $.
dvbdfbdioo $p |- ( ph -> E. b e. RR A. x e. ( A (,) B ) ( abs ` ( F ` x ) ) <_ b ) $.
$d A a b x $.
$d B a b x $.
$d F a b x $.
$d a ph $.
